settings.heading: 17025 Accredited Calibrations Services - Accuracy You Can Trust

settings.text:
At Standard Calibrations, accuracy, compliance, and our overall commitment to ‘every measurement matters’ remain at the heart of our services. Our ISO/IEC 17025 accredited calibration laboratory ensures the highest level of accuracy, helping your business meet stringent standards and maintain peak performance and safety. From maritime and DoD sectors to commercial industries and mission-critical data centers, our expert calibration services are designed to support a wide range of needs.

Our commitment to excellence started with the design of our new 44,500-square-foot, state-of-the-art facility in Chesapeake, VA. Collaborating with top architects, engineers, and our quality assurance team, we built this purpose-driven headquarters with accuracy and reliability at its core. This facility enables us to provide industry-leading instrument calibration services, ensuring precision and consistency across diverse sectors.

Our 5,000-square-foot accredited calibration lab [link to page] is strategically designed to minimize environmental factors, such as sunlight, that could affect measurement accuracy. The 1,000-square-foot dimensional calibration room is maintained at a precise 68 ± 5°F and monitored by an advanced environmental control system to ensure the highest measurement accuracy. Every aspect, from electrical grounding to gravitational force surveys, is engineered to reduce uncertainty.

Additionally, our 1,000-square-foot liquid flow calibration room, equipped with SCI/ITAC automated controls and coriolis flow standards, enables precise fuel and water flow calibrations, with fuel flow rates up to 220 GPM and water flow to 10,000 GPM.

settings.heading: 17025 Accredited Calibration for Critical Applications
settings.row_content:
Our ISO/IEC 17025 accreditation guarantees our technical competence and dedication to quality. This accreditation ensures that your instruments and equipment are calibrated to the highest standards of accuracy. Our lab serves various industries, including:

  • Maritime and Defense: Ensure mission-critical equipment performs with accuracy.
  • Commercial and Industrial: Maintain the reliability and efficiency of your production systems.
  • Mission-Critical Data Centers: Ensure accuracy and compliance in high-demand data environments where uptime and environmental control is essential.

Equipped with the latest tools and expertise, our calibration lab provides reliable results to optimize your operations and ensure compliance within industry regulations.

settings.heading: CalCloud Asset Management Software
settings.row_content:
Maximize efficiency and stay ahead of calibration schedules with CalCloud, our asset management software solution. Designed to streamline your equipment management, CalCloud offers:

  • Real-Time Asset Tracking: Know the status and location of your equipment at all times.
  • Calibration Scheduling and Alerts: Never miss a calibration deadline with automated scheduling and notification features.
  • Detailed Historical Data and Reporting: Access past calibration records, certificates, and performance reports for full traceability, compliance, and always be audit-ready.

With CalCloud, you’ll not only maintain your equipment at peak performance but also reduce downtime and ensure full compliance with calibration schedules and standards.

settings.heading: Benefits of Our Accredited Calibration Services
settings.row_content:
1. Highest Accuracy: ISO/IEC 17025 accredited calibrations ensure the accuracy you can rely on.
  2. Regulatory Compliance: Stay compliant with industry and regulatory requirements.
  3. Complete Traceability: Receive detailed calibration certificates with traceability to national and international standards.
  4. Fast Turnaround Times: Our efficient processes reduce downtime and get your equipment back in service quickly.
  5. CalCloud Asset Management: Simplify asset management and never miss a calibration with CalCloud’s intuitive software platform.
